By using two sets of square brackets

options.name: It reverses the order of elements in an array
It reshapes an array into a specified shape
It sorts an array in ascending order

options.name: It returns the indices that would sort an array
It searches for the maximum value in an array
It returns the number of occurrences of a specified element in an array
It counts the number of elements in an array that satisfy a specified condition
